author: Seren Morris
title: CDC Offers Advice for Reducing Social Stigma Amid Coronavirus-Related Hate Crimes
description: The coronavirus outbreak has resulted in certain groups facing social stigma, discrimination and hate crimes.
content: As the coronavirus outbreak continues to impact countries around the world, an ongoing issue certain groups are facing is social stigmatization and discrimination. Amid coronavirus-related hate crimes, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has … [+5678 chars]
